name: Guayabita
content: Aldo's web development skills are truly outstanding, he has developed amazing pages with a clean and professional design in time and fashion without loosing a detail on the frontend for not only ease to make changes but making it easy for his customers to further develop over his work!

name: Alewito
content: Aldo is a great friend and a great developer, he has helped me a lot with my projects and has always been there for me, he is a great person and a great developer, I recommend him 100%.
